body:
Hi All,

*Environmental Design Solutions [EDS] is pleased to announce a first of its
kind comprehensive training program on Daylighting Buildings in Mumbai and
Delhi.*


EDS is a sustainability consulting firm focusing on the built environment.
The diverse milieu of its team of experts converges on energy efficient
building design and policies, building code development, green building
certification, climate change mitigation policies, capacity building and
training.

* *

*PROGRAM OBJECTIVE:*

- Equip participants with the practical know-how to undertake
daylighting studies for their own projects.

*PROGRAM HIGHLIGHTS*

- Clarity on theory and manual calculations
- Creating good quality computer models
- Critical analysis of computational results
- Taking design decisions based on the analysis

The workshop will be conducted by expert EDS staff having vast experience
in daylighting as well as teaching this subject in reputed educational
institutions internationally.


Training Directors - Tanmay Tathagat, Gurneet Singh

Trainers - Deepa Parekh, Kavita Gonsalves, Dipti Talwar


*Register soon. **Link to the Registration
Form<https://docs.google.com/a/edsglobal.com/spreadsheet/viewform?fromEmail=true&formkey=dEdNNTRqaG5MYVliYmlmdEpSbnRHYVE6MQ>
